title: Crossroads (Steve Vai, Ry Cooder, blues guitar, unofficial sound
description:
These audio clips are from the 1986 film Crossroads: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0090888/

Annoyingly, there's never been a soundtrack with all the music from the film. The music is performed by Steve Vai, Ry Cooder, Sonny Terry, Bill Kanengiser, Terry Evans, Amy Madigan, and John "Juke" Logan. See IMDB for proper titles and full credits.

I recorded them from a HiFi VHS tape and encoded them with MP3 Producer Pro at 256kbps, 44kHz, stereo. The audio quality is good. The highs are crisp and the lows rumble, but there's a bit of background noise. These are rips from the film, so there's some dialogue and sound effects.

Enjoy.
